title: Weird visual animation / squares
body:
Was playing all morning. Came back this evening and first game had these strange visuals. Not sure if it's hardware or software related, thought I would share. Nothing has recently changed with my setup :/

/Cheers

replies.body: Thanks for the video, that helps a lot!  This could be happening for a few reasons like outdated drivers, hardware problems, or just bad files.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide which will provide steps to make sure your drivers are updated and files are in good shape.  If necessary, you can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which can automatically repair any bad files.  Hope that helps!
Thanks I'll check it out. I know I'm not on current nvidia drivers, but hadn't been. I'll report back either way. /cheers.
Between the nvidia update and repair it seems to have gone away. Thanks.
